channel.title: parenting on David Wesst
channel.description: Recent content in parenting on David Wesst

item.title: Keeping Your Edge on an Extended Break
item.description: I recently came off of four months of parental leave where I had a fantastic time bonding with my new daughter. Although four months doesn’t seem like much of a hiatus, I learned very quickly that being a full time parent doesn’t leave much time to keeping my professional edge. They might seem obvious, but it took me a while to find a balance to make sure spending time with my daughter didn’t play second fiddle to my profession passion and/or obsession.
